I participated in a raid. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Honorable.stages.0.de: We recently raided another faction. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Honorable.stages.1.de: It's been far too long since we raided anyone. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
I participated in a raid. How could we do that? It's horribly shameful!
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Abhorrent.stages.0.de: We recently raided another faction. This is horrible and brings shame to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Abhorrent.stages.1.de: It's been a long since we raided anyone. This is as it should be, we are not bullies.
